thread.title: Powell's tone is more hawkish than Yellen's, says First Standard Financial's Peter Cardillo

title: Powell's tone is more hawkish than Yellen's, says First Standard Financial's Peter Cardillo
text:
Powell's tone is more hawkish than Yellen's, says First Standard Financial's Peter Cardillo 3:11pm EST - 03:49 
There is enough room for a minimum of four rate hikes this year, says Peter Cardillo, chief market economist at First Standard Financial. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
There is enough room for a minimum of four rate hikes this year, says Peter Cardillo, chief market economist at First Standard Financial. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EW0Gnf
